message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this amazing product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're just starting our conversation, I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us off on the right foot. I'm offering the product to you for $1300000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  It's a good starting point, but I'm looking to get this product for closer to my budget. I'm willing to offer $1100000.  What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1100000. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway between our previous offers. I'm counteroffering the product to you for $1200000. What do you think?
